left the door open to running for governor. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. The decision of Mr. Mike Pence , which was first reported by The Indianapolis Star, ended weeks of speculation- and a draft movement- from conservative activists that he would join the field of prospective Republican contenders

Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said.
